tweet: Might be time to get a new bag to hide my beautiful face, this one is really starting to smell. Especially from the inside.
Everyone is downloading Veks and Silence! My trigger finger is SO sore! I like that! And remember, Friends tell friends about cool games!
The internet is buzzing with positive feedback about my adventure! Who knew people would enjoy making zombies explode as much as I do.
Whatever you do don't press up,up,down,down,left,right,left,right,b,a on your xbox 360 controller while playing Veks and Silence! Shhhhhh!!!
The only thing the Zomboss hates eating are explosives. They give him heartburn.
